title: How to Draw Princess Peach

steps.headline: Start with a circle, for the head.
Draw a small oval for the body connecting to her neck.
steps.description: Draw two short lines that connect to her head.

steps.headline: Draw her face.
steps.description: You just need two ovals for her eyes and a semicircle for her mouth.

steps.headline: Draw big puffy short sleeves coming from the top of her torso.
steps.description: Make her arms right in front of her body. Draw her arms in long gloves.

steps.headline: Draw a flower shape for her dress.
Draw the folds of her skirt.
Draw a "w" shape a little above her head.
Draw vertical lines from the "w" shapes tips.
Draw the top of her hair.
steps.description: You will finish it in the next step.

steps.headline: Add in all the extra details.
steps.description: When you're done, color her the way you want.

text: Start with a circle, for the head.  Draw a small oval for the body connecting to her neck. Draw two short lines that connect to her head. Draw her face. You just need two ovals for her eyes and a semicircle for her mouth. Draw big puffy short sleeves coming from the top of her torso. Make her arms right in front of her body. Draw her arms in long gloves. Draw a flower shape for her dress.  Draw the folds of her skirt.  Draw a "w" shape a little above her head. This is for her crown. Draw vertical lines from the "w" shapes tips.  Draw the top of her hair. You will finish it in the next step. Add in all the extra details. When you're done, color her the way you want. Finish. You have Princess Peach!
sentences: Start with a circle, for the head.
Draw a small oval for the body connecting to her neck.
Draw two short lines that connect to her head.
You just need two ovals for her eyes and a semicircle for her mouth.
Draw big puffy short sleeves coming from the top of her torso.
Make her arms right in front of her body.
Draw her arms in long gloves.
Draw a flower shape for her dress.
Draw the folds of her skirt.
Draw a "w" shape a little above her head.
Draw vertical lines from the "w" shapes tips.
Draw the top of her hair.
You will finish it in the next step.
Add in all the extra details.
When you're done, color her the way you want.
